===============

Module Contents

Classes

.. autoapisummary::

   wrappers.Conv2dv2




.. class:: Conv2dv2(*args, **kwargs)


   Bases: :py:obj:`torch.nn.Conv2d`

   A wrapper around :class:`torch.nn.Conv2d` to support more features.

   .. method:: forward(self, x)
